snippet: Chicago’s 2-1 victory gave it a 3-2 lead in the series as it headed back to Minnesota.
abstract: Hockey Roundup; Chicago Blackhawks defeat Minnesota Wild, 2-1, to lead their Western Conference semifinal series, 3-2; other NHL playoff news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s 2-1 victory gave it a 3-2 lead in the series as it headed back to Minnesota.

headline.main: Blackhawks Push Wild to the Brink
headline.print_headline: Blackhawks Push Wild to the Brink
